headline: KeyBanc cuts oil forecast but upgrades Expand Energy on natural gas outlook
summary: Investing.com -- KeyBanc Capital Markets lowered its oil price forecast and raised its natural gas outlook, reflecting a shift in commodity expectations ahead of the first-quarter earnings season. The firm also upgraded natural gas producer Expand Energy to “Overweight” with a $130 price target, citing its defensiveness and investment-grade status.
